name: Sprout (itch) (Vorty, emiliefrcht)
description:
In Sprout, you are in charge of Mars' first (and only) greenhouse. Despite your best efforts, your tomato plant is dying! You must collect fertilizer to prevent the health bar at the top of your screen from being completely depleted.

A & D to move left and right
Spacebar to jump

Brought to you by Planetesimal Games
